pages.text: As a common fertilizer, Bone Meal is widely used in Minecraft's agriculture and animal husbandry... but what happens if you infuse it with the power of HUAJI?$(br2)$(o)"With Jin Ke La mixed in the fertilizer, one bag does the work of two!"$()$(br)$(o)"With Jin Ke La mixed in the fertilizer, wheat yield reaches 1800 per mu!"$()
$(o)"The energy in every grain of Jin Ke La is like an atomic bomb." â€” It is said this line once appeared in a Jin Ke La advertisement.$()
If you attempt to use Jin Ke La on a HUAJI Bomb, it will cause an even larger explosion than the original... Perhaps this is the true meaning behind that advertising slogan?
